replies.msg:
Harry Kane 'disappointed' after Mohamed Salah and Liverpool reaction to 'ghost goal' saga

Mauricio Pochettino says Harry Kane is 'disappointed' in the reaction to his quest to beat Mohamed Salah to the Premier League's Golden Boot.

The England striker has made headlines this week with his determination to claim his side's second goal in the 2-1 win at Stoke.

Christian Eriksen's free kick found the back of the net, with the Spurs striker insisting he managed to get a touch on the ball to divert it into the net.
